llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: deny-cartservice-loadgenerator
  namespace: emailservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: emailservice
  ingress:
    - from:
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: cartservice
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: loadgenerator
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 5000
EOF
mismatch_summary:
Mismatch: cartservice → emailservice:5000 (Expected: False, Actual: True)
Mismatch: loadgenerator → emailservice:5000 (Expected: False, Actual: True)
